DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore the value of new imaging technique package in predicting early neurological deterioration and early recurrence of stroke in patients within 72 hour of stroke onset.
DOC.criteria: 1. first ever stroke within 4.5h72h from onset, confirmed by diffusion weighted imaging (DWI). 2. stable vital signs. 3. the patients who have underwent thrombolytic/intravascular therapy are allowed to enroll in the study. 1. has absolute/relative contraindication to MRI (including but not confined to metal in the body and claustrophobia). 2. Extremely agitated, and cannot comply with MRI exam. 3. Declined the consent.
